snippet: President Obama’s 91-year-old step-grandmother suffered bruises and shock after a car she was traveling in rolled over, a relative and a hospital official said Monday.
abstract: President Obama’s 91-year-old step-grandmother, Sarah, suffers bruises and shock after a car she was traveling in rolled over, near her home in Kenya.
lead_paragraph: President Obama’s 91-year-old step-grandmother suffered bruises and shock after a car she was traveling in rolled over, a relative and a hospital official said Monday.

headline.main: Kenya: ‘Granny’ Obama Suffers Bruises When Car Taking Her Home Flips Over
headline.print_headline: Kenya: ‘Granny’ Obama Suffers Bruises When Car Taking Her Home Flips Over
